channel.description: Secure your hooks project Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: A new doc that describes specifically how to secure a hook project. Takes information from the current setup your hooks doc. Links to original docs: This doc pulls security content from this doc. Common Hook set-up steps: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/common-hook-set-up-steps/nodejs/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.
